title: MicroserviceIndependentDeployment - Q0001
text: What does independent deployment mean in microservices architecture?

options.text: Each service can be deployed without affecting others
All services must be deployed together
Deployment depends on a central orchestrator
Deployment requires downtime for all services

explanation: Independent deployment allows each microservice to be deployed separately without impacting other services.

title: MicroserviceIndependentDeployment - Q0002
text: Which of the following is a key benefit of independent deployment?
explanation: Independent deployment enables faster release cycles by allowing teams to deploy changes without coordination delays.

title: MicroserviceIndependentDeployment - Q0003
text: Which of the following is a prerequisite for independent deployment?
explanation: Loose coupling ensures that services can be deployed independently without breaking dependencies.

title: MicroserviceIndependentDeployment - Q0004

explanation: Blue-Green deployment allows independent updates with minimal downtime, supporting microservice independence.

title: MicroserviceIndependentDeployment - Q0005

explanation: Inter-service dependencies can make independent deployment difficult if not managed properly.

title: MicroserviceIndependentDeployment - Q0006
